channel.title: All Money-Making Surveys
channel.description: Everyone just post them here instead of everyone posting separate topics. Include referral links if you wish. Also, don't post unless you have a screenshot of the money in your Paypal account, or some other form of proof.

item.title: All Money-Making Surveys
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:9, topic:132084”][quote author=The Un-Named link=topic=183066.msg1666541#msg1666541 date=1186839731]
Ciao.co.uk.

I don’t have proof but I guarantee 100% that you can completely bluff this and make £1 to £3+ a survey. Mums got pretty much £50+($100) just doing this every few days.
[/quote]

Hrm. I trust you. Can you sign up if you live in the US? I can’t find their US version of the site, so I may simply sign up for the UK version. And how do they send you money? Check or Paypal or they give you a choice?[/quote]

I’m not sure, think it’s a check. Not sure if it works for the US, though.

Read full topic

item.title: All Money-Making Surveys

I don’t have proof but I guarantee 100% that you can completely bluff this and make £1 to £3+ a survey. Mums got pretty much £50+($100) just doing this every few days.[/quote]

item.title: All Money-Making Surveys
item.dc:creator: @tr3v0r TR3V0R
item.description:
@tr3v0r wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:4, topic:132084”][quote author=TR3V0R link=topic=183066.msg1664956#msg1664956 date=1186776788]
TBH, I think there all scams.
[/quote]

What do they scam? They get you to fill out two surveys before you realize it’s a scam?[/quote]
Usually you will have to sign up and complete one servey and you have to sign up and pay in that servey.

Read full topic

Post them with referral links if you’d like. And did you get money in your paypal account?
